<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Demonologist](/NPCs.aspx?ID=931)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Demonologists can pull a creature from the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13) and bend it to their will... for a time.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Necromancer_Demonologist.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Demonologist](/NPCs.aspx?ID=931)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 231</row>

**Perception** +15

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +14, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +16, [Demon Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +18, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +11, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Abyssal Temptation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) Demonic study has garnered the attention of at least one [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28) that is actively trying to possess the demonologist. When the demonologist publicly espouses the benefits of demonic power (whether they believe it a good thing or not), they gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks, AC, and saves for 1 day. These bonuses don't apply against demons. At the end of the day, the demonologist must attempt a DC 20 Will save, becoming possessed for 1 day on a failure (permanently on a critical failure).

**Items**
[_+1 longspear_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6), scholarly robes, [Material Component Pouch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=33), [spell book](/Equipment.aspx?ID=53) (_Fiendish Hypotheses and Protections from Same_)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 100

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longspear_ +17 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+9 piercing

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 26, attack +18
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (x2), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Hideous Laughter](/Spells.aspx?ID=150), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271)
- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Glyph of Warding](/Spells.aspx?ID=138), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [Stinking Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=309)
- **4th**
[Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255)

**Breach the Abyss** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Requirements** The demonologist's last action was to cast a non-cantrip spell; **Effect** The demonologist siphons energy drawn from the Abyss into their weapon. Until the end of the turn, the weapon deals an extra 2d6 damage. Roll 1d20 to determine the type: 1-7 acid, 8-9 cold, 10-11 electricity, 12-18 fire, 19-20 negative.

**Demon Summoning**   The demonologist can cast a 5th-level [_summon fiend_](/Spells.aspx?ID=323) arcane spell to summon a demon. To do so, they must sacrifice two 4th-level prepared spells and voluntarily take 4d12 mental damage that can't be reduced or prevented. If the demonologist is unable to Sustain the Spell, including if they're knocked out or killed, the spell continues, but the GM rolls a DC 10 flat check each round, ending the spell on a failure.

</column>

name: Demonologist
